items.title: Nerder She Wrote: Trade Deadline Special

items.content:
Basketball Buds on Twitch: Zach Harper, Tom Haberstroh, BIG Wos, Ethan Strauss, Dave DuFour and Anthony Mayes. 
 Produced by: Jade Hoye
 Rundown:
 Anthony Davis 
 Klutch Psyop
 How trade days have changed over the years
 It seems like the Lakers are making progress
 Has it backfired?
 The Drama > The Game
 Warriors ruined basketball is why people love trade speculation
 Media is a bunch of boosters
 Point of Contention
 NBA is losing b/c players have one foot out the door
 A Darwinian Hellscape
 Value of Lakers roster not optimized
 Are they better if they are not on Lakers
 Also, are Celtic players overrated?
 What happens when Kyrie leaves? 
 Jason Tatum
 How has LeBron handled this? 
 Blood boys
 Baldness and basketball mortality theory
 Anthony Davis' game is boring
 Zach Harper AD Truther
 Is he a generational talent? 
 KG vs AD
 AD Top 25 ever?
 Kevin Durant not talking to the media???
 John Wall ruptures achilles at home, out for 12 month
 End
  
 Watch the video at: https://www.twitch.tv/countthedings
  
 Support us on www.patreon.com/countthedings
 Find us: www.countthedings.com
 Social: @back2backpod @countthedings
 Facebook: www.facebook.com/countthedings

items.content:
The Friday Mailbag: Zach Harper, BIG Wos, Eden Liu, Nitzan Bluvstein, Anthony Mayes, Jerome Cheng, Mariano Bivins and Tom Haberstroh.

items.title: The Friday Mailbag: Hello and Welcome

items.content:
Emergency Porzingis Trade Pod with Dave DuFour, Zach Harper, Jared Dubin, Coach Thorpe and Ethan Strauss
 THEN...
 Nerder She Wrote with Dave DuFour, Coach David Thorpe and Adam Mares.
 Rundown 
 The Polar Vortex
 Anthony Davis Soap Opera
 Coach Thorpe AD Rant
 Take everything from the Lakers!
 Pelicans Organization is a mess
 LeBron and Davis together
 Demps to blame?
 Unless they (NOLA) change, what's the point?
 Pelicans need to tank now?
 Jahlil Okafor is good!
 Humble + System
 Great touch and footwork 
 Conditioning 
 Emmanuel Mudiay 
 Second chance guys 
 Alvin Gentry fired up
 Questions
 Is Athleticism overrated 
 Robert Covington vs Kawhi Leonard
 Who could Lakers replace Luke Walton with?
 LeBron already knows who it is. 
 Jason Kidd?
 Back up the truck for Jay Wright 
 Mark Jackson?
 Porzingis wants out of New York
 Pre Agency and Qualifying offers
 Is all this better for the league?
 Best of All Time?   End   Watch the video on Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/countthedings      Support us on www.patreon.com/countthedings
 Find us: www.countthedings.com
 Social: @back2backpod @countthedings
 Facebook: www.facebook.com/countthedings

items.title: The Friday Mailbag: Fyre It Up!

items.content:
Nerder She Wrote: Dave DuFour and David Thorpe
 Rundown
 Harden on fire, can it last? 
 Guarding Harden
 The Spurs on a run
 Defense 
 DeMar DeRozan story time
 76ers without Butler
 Simmons with Embiid
 Putting the pieces together
 Lessons from Showtime Lakers
 Simmons & Giannis and improvement 
 Paul George vs Russ
 MVP!!
 Victor Oladipo injury
 What do the Pacers do now? 
 Damian Lillard and Nurkic
 Time to trade CJ McCollum 
 Closing thoughts
 End
  
 Support us on www.patreon.com/countthedings
 Find us: www.countthedings.com

items.title: The Friday Mailbag: Still Recovering

items.content:
Nerder She Wrote: Dave DuFour and David Thorpe answer listener questions. 
 Topics: 
 Warriors are untouchable 
 Curry is a force
 Blake Griffin's mechanics 
 Shooting on the way up
 What to watch for when you like a bad team
 How much can we expect the West to change? 
 Grizzlies are broken
 Guy who needs a change of scenery?
 Teaching the basics
 More zone lately? 
 Brad Stevens Debate
 How coaches evolve
 Billy Donavan and Russ
 Westbrook's regression
 Dennis Smith trade rumors 
 AAU vs Euro camps
 Donovan MItchell 
 Jimmy Butler vs Brett Brown
 Final thoughts
  
 Support us on www.patreon.com/countthedings
 Find us: www.countthedings.com

 Facebook: www.facebook.com/countthedings

items.title: The Friday Mailbag: Happy Christmas

items.content:
Nerder She Wrote: Dave DuFour, David Thorpe and special guest Hall of Fame reporter, David Aldridge from the Athletic DC
 https://theathletic.com/dc/
 Sponsored by: The Athletic get 40% Off https://theathletic.com/back2back
  
 Rundown: 
 Favorite Holiday drinks
 Wizards / Wall 
 Dwight Howard
 Wall's effort / inconsistency 
 LeBron and Anthony Davis
 Celtics have better assets with Kyrie caveat
 Stars playing with LeBron 
 Chris Bosh as an example
 Too many stars in Boston
 Rockets / James Harden / West
 What are you watching Coach?
 Too many 3s a problem?
 Final thoughts
 Appreciate The Game
 LeBron's message to his son
 End
  
 Support us on www.patreon.com/countthedings

items.title: Nerder She Wrote with David Aldridge: Wiz-Wall, Anthony Davis, Rockets-Harden

items.content:
Basketball Buds: Zach Harper, Tom Haberstroh, Ethan Strauss, Dave DuFour, Anthony Mayes and Jovan Buha. 
 Produced by: Jade Hoye
  
 Rundown: 
 James Harden
 What's the problem?
 Refs this year
 Clippers regressing to the mean
 Rockets good now?
 Chris Paul washed
 Still injured? Getting old?
 Behind the Rockets 4 game win streak
 Thunder are the #2 team in the West
 Lakers have LeBron tho
 Kemba regression
 Welcome Ethan
 Grizz or Clipps, who's more legit? 
 Trail Blazers 
 What is cute ugly?
 French Bull Dogs can't have sex
 Fan Duel x NBA
 LeBron broken hand in last year's Finals
 Lines
 The carry is worse then the travel
 End    Support us on www.patreon.com/countthedings
 Find us: www.countthedings.com
 Social: @back2backpod @countthedings
 Facebook: www.facebook.com/countthedings

items.title: The Friday Mailbag

items.content:
Nerder She Wrote with Dave DuFour and Coach David Thorpe
 Appreciating Defense
 Sponsored by: The Athletic  theathletic.com/back2back. for 40% off
 Rundown: 
 Allen Iverson story time with Coach
 Let's talk about defense 
 Thunder without Roberson are good
 Westbrook has been great
 Memphis too
 Men in the middle
 Marc Gasol
 Elasticity
 Jaren Jackson is going to be a Hall of Famer
 Like a running back
 The "Economy of Movement"
 Faking effort 
 Joakim Noah back
 If he's healthy...watch out. 
 Motor and energy are off the charts
 Timberwolves 
 Karl Towns fools gold? 
 Andrew Wiggins 
 Derrick Rose unreal
 Dario Saric
 Who would have thought?
 Lakers 
 Lonzo's defense
 Kuzma
 Anthony Davis future
 Final thoughts
 End
  
 Support us on www.patreon.com/countthedings
 Find us: www.countthedings.com

items.title: Nerder She Wrote: In Defense of Defense

items.content:
Basketball Buds: Zach Harper, Tom Habersteroh, BIG Wos and Dave DuFour
 Produced by: Jade Hoye
  
 Rundown:
 Nerder She Wrote
 Jade's Esophagus Injury
 Flavored Beer
 Mexican Beer is German?
 Basic Brad Live Show in Boston
 Fred Hoiberg Fired
 The timing!
 Jabari Parker / Lauri Markannan 
 Who are they building around?
 Spurs digression
 Where do the Bulls go from here?
 Didn't deserve to get fired didn't deserve to keep his job
 Fred Hoiberg to Minnesota?
 Coach whiplash
 Karl-Anthony Towns
 Timberwolves since Butler trade
 Daryl "D-Mo" Morey lied to Tom Haberstroh
 The Rockets still suck
 Giannis punching people in the dick
 Kobe comments decoded
 Anthony Davis 
 Dell Demps vs Alvin Gentry
 No one has ever turned down the Super Max
 End
  
 Support us on www.patreon.com/countthedings
 Find us: www.countthedings.com
 Social: @back2backpod @countthedings

items.title: The Friday Mailbag

items.content:
Nerder She Wrote: Dave DuFour, David Thorpe and Adam Mares from SB Nations Denver Stiffs. 
 https://www.denverstiffs.com/
 Sponsored by: Fan Duel www.fanduel.com/b2b
 Rundown: 
 We're doing video?
 Nuggets are good!
 Paul Millsap's effect
 Mike Malone coaching well and talking shit 
 Has done well with missing pieces 
 Nikola Jokic 
 Being "one pass away"
 Offensive rebounding strategies
 Ethan Strauss' "Next Trillion Dollar Innovation"
 Passing off the backboard 
 Thorpe, Pete D'Alessandro and Jason Williams story time
 Learning the game through tradition and innovation 
 Ban The Charge! 
 Wisconsin player taking 5 charges 
 Innovations / Improvements
 Developmental innovations
 Ignorance in youth basketball 
 Rim height
 Teaching yourself, experience vs instructional learning  
 "Players have to play"
 Scrimmaging in practice 
 A.I. and pattern recognition in basketball
 On the fly learning 
 Speed and mental quickness 
 Lonzo Ball is smart
 Clone Wars: Team LeBron vs Team Giannis 
 Gregg Popovich is bored with the game 
 Too many 3s
 Players getting longer, defending 3 getting better
 Bigs can play small...can small guys play big?
 Life is Basketball is Life
 So many unicorns 
 Final thoughts
 Thorpe's Love Letter to The Game 
 End
  
 Support us on www.patreon.com/countthedings
  Find us: www.countthedings.com
 Social: @back2backpod @countthedings

 Passing off the backboard 
 Thorpe, Pete D'Alessandro and Jason Williams story time
 Learning the game through tradition and innovation 
 Ban The Charge! 
 Wisconsin player taking 5 charges 
 Innovations / Improvements
 Developmental innovations
 Ignorance in youth basketball 
 Rim height
 Teaching yourself, experience vs instructional learning  
 "Players have to play"
 Scrimmaging in practice 
 A.I. and pattern recognition in basketball
 On the fly learning 
 Speed and mental quickness 
 Lonzo Ball is smart
 Clone Wars: Team LeBron vs Team Giannis 
 Gregg Popovich is bored with the game 
 Too many 3s
 Players getting longer, defending 3 getting better
 Bigs can play small...can small guys play big?
 Life is Basketball is Life
 So many unicorns 
 Final thoughts
 Thorpe's Love Letter to The Game 
 End
  
 Support us on www.patreon.com/countthedings
  Find us: www.countthedings.com
 Social: @back2backpod @countthedings

 How good is Nikola Vucevic?
 Greg Monroe vibes
 Nobody respects Kevin Durant 
 KD's defense lacking
 Pacing himself 
 Celtic and Basic Brad
 Need an offensive coordinator 
 No good shooters?
 Too many long 2's 
 The West is a mess
 Jazz and Rockets
 Thunder 
 Mitchell doing too little or too much?
 Not enough small ball lineups 
 What's wrong with Houston?
 Harden's big night's not so impressive
 Need to push the pace
 The Warriors have no competition

items.title: Thanksgiving Mailbag

items.content:
Dave DuFour, Blk Tray and Justin Rowan talk about a four-game Tuesday night in the NBA. The guys chat about the Wizards comeback win over the Clippers, Toronto needing a clutch shot to beat the Magic, the mounting struggles for the Heat and more.
  
 Jared Weiss of The Athletic joins to talk about the Celtics recent struggles.
  
 Produced by: Rob Lopez
  
 Support us on www.patreon.com/countthedings
 Find us: www.countthedings.com

items.title: NBA Daily Ding: Wizards Comeback Win, JR Smith Done in Cleveland, Heat Lose Again, Celtics Early Season Struggles

items.content:
Basketball Buds: Zach Harper, Tom Haberstroh, BIG Wos, David Thorpe and Dave DuFour. 
 Sponsored by: Simple Contacts https://www.simplecontacts.com/btb
 Fan Duel: www.fanduel.com/b2b
 Produced by: Jade Hoye
  
 Rundown: 
 What's going on in Sac Town?
 Dave Joerger issues really?
 Refusing to tank
 Bagley not playing enough?
 Vivek or Vlade
 Brandon Williams vs Dave Joerger
 No incentive to tank
 Kemba Walker Keeper
 Better than Kyrie? Nah. 
 Gordon Hayward benched
 Kemba like Curry
 Hornets are not so good
 John Wall trade possible?
 Wizards' Flea Market
 Otto Porter moveable 
 Celtics
 Jaylen Brown
 Jayson Tatum
 Players need more oxygen
 Not getting to the basket enough
 Hayward not the same player
 Markelle Fultz issues
 Jump shot free throws
 Free throw science 
 Coach's Shaq story 
 Wall vs Scott Brooks
 This was Washington's year!
 JR Smith / Cavs split
 Possible landing spots
 Steven Adams is a beast
 Hypothetical: Adams vs Pekovic steel cage match
 Grizzlies back!
 Marc Gasol 
 Jaren Jackson   Radio Zach    Least favorite stat   End    Support us on www.patreon.com/countthedings
 Find us: www.countthedings.com
 Social: @back2backpod @countthedings

items.title: The Friday Mailbag: No Way Around It

items.content:
Nerder She Wrote: Dave DuFour, Coach David Thorpe and SB Nation's Seerat Sohi. 
 Rundown:
 76ers-Fultz Issues
 JJ Redick
 Not running your best lineups in November
 Simmons / Fultz 
 Embiid and switching 
 The trap teams are falling into 
 Trae Young switch buster
 Hope in Atlanta!
 Comp: Mark Price
 Jaren Jackson Jr looks real good
 What does Memphis do now? Win now. 
 Anthony Davis' future in LA or Philly?
 Final thoughts
  
 Support us on www.patreon.com/countthedings
 Find us: www.countthedings.com
 Social: @back2backpod @countthedings

Basketball Buds: Zach Harper, BIG Wos, Dave DuFour, Tom Haberstroh and The Athletic's Sam Amick 
 Sponsored by: Fan Duel | www.fanduel.com/b2b
 Merch: https://cottonbureau.com/stores/count-the-dings#/shop
  
 Topics: 
 Murray vs Kyrie
 Unwritten rules and being disrespectful
 Kyrie's Celtics future
 Chatter Chatter
 New Raps same as last year
 Let's talk Lakers
 At what point do things come to a head?
 Magic management style is tough
 LeBron has not been great
 Ingram on the block
 Playing with LeBron
 Anthony Davis on the way?
 The Clippers 
 Jayson "Kobe" Tatum 
 Young players are stupid
 Welcome Tom Haberstroh
 Vince Carter storied with Sam
 Shorter shorts
 Sam and Ben Stiller best friends
 Tom Thibodeau on the hot seat?
 Rather be the Wolves or Wizards?
 IG trainer vids
 Players who block reporters and why?
 End    Support us on www.patreon.com/countthedings

items.title: The Friday Mailbag: Life After Love

items.content:
Nerder She Wrote: Dave DuFour, David Thorpe and Sport Illustrated's and host of 'The Breakaway' Podcast, Rob Mahoney. 
 Sponsor: Join us on Fan Fuel every Wednesday for the B2B Challenge. www.fanduel.com/b2b to sign up. 
 Back To Back Merch: https://cottonbureau.com/stores/count-the-dings#/shop
  
 Topics: 
 Halloween Recap
 Coach a dog or cat guy?
 Dog DNA test?
 The changing offensive game
 Taking more 3s
 Defenses are not good right now
 Switching 
 Warriors look unbeatable, why even watch?
 Curry hunting his shots 
 Patient Durant
 Jimmy "Bubble Wrapped" Butler
 Derrick Rose revitalized 
 Big Men Back in the NBA?
 Letting it fly!
 Big Men lineups on the rise? 
 What's wrong with the Pelicans? 
 The Rockets really look bad
 They look like a completely different team
 Wizards are a mess. Can it be fixed? 
 Otto Porter trade destinations
 Final Thoughts
  
 Listen to Rob's Pod 'The Breakaway'

Dog DNA test?

The changing offensive game

Taking more 3s

Defenses are not good right now

Switching 

Warriors look unbeatable, why even watch?

Curry hunting his shots 

Patient Durant

items.content:
The Basketball Buds: Zach Harper, Tom Haberstroh, BIG Wos, Anthony Mayes and special guest Ryen Russillo. 
 Produced by: Jade Hoye
 Topics: 
 Daily Ding
 Spotify vs Apple vs Tidal
 Klay Thompson went off
 Warriors are too good
 Steph is humble 
 Welcome Ryen Russillo 
 Steph a system player? 
 The most disrespected superstar? 
 Hello Dad LeBron!
 The West is relentless
 LeBron not playing D
 Being in LA not as planned out as people think
 Anthony Davis Wild Card
 Issues recruiting players to LA
 Worried about Kyrie?
 Offensive issues / clunky 
 Getting awkwrd
 Raptors looking good / Small Ibaka
 76ers still think they were going to get LeBron
 Rich Paul anxiety
 The Process supposed to get you MJ?
 Markelle Fultz rehab ugh
 How the pieces fit
 For the basketball Buds Overtime subscribe to Count The Dings on Patreon. www.patreon.com/countthedings
  
 Back To Back Merch: https://cottonbureau.com/stores/count-the-dings#/shop
  
 FanDuel Wednesday Challenge: www.fanduel.com/b2b
  
 Find us: www.countthedings.com

items.title: The Friday Mailbag:  Devil's Advocate

items.content:
Nerder She Wrote: Dave DuFour, Coach David Thorpe and Nate Duncan from the Dun'd On Podcast. 
  
 Brought to you by:
 The Athletic www.theathletic.com/backtoback
 Fan Duel www.fanduel.com/b2b
  
 Topics: 
 Steph Better
 Was this expected? 
 Curry The Avalanche 
 'The Revolution' 
 Curry is unafraid 
 Iguadala issues
 Team with best chance of beating Warriors? 
 Blake Griffin is rollin'
 Great playmaker too!
 Buying the Pistons?
 How about them Bucks?
 Giannis' shot / mechanics
 No ego. Wants to win.
 Bucks bench
 Giannis' future
 The Raptors / Kawhi
 Increased pace effect on veteran units
 Final thoughts
 End
  
 Support us on www.patreon.com/countthedings
 Find us: www.countthedings.com
 Social: @back2backpod @countthedings

items.content:
TV Book Club: Anthony Mayes, Eden Liu and Jake Hoye
 Eden and Jake are mad at Anthony because he didn't do his own homework and watch the Romanoffs.
 We try to put our finger on what is missing and decide if we're in or out. 
 The Deuce: Vincent's Vermont Vacation
 Lori's rising star, Candy fighting misogyny in pursuit of her art, breakups, coverups, well done steak, an introducing The Deuce Death Pool. 
 Haunting of Hill House teaser: Navigating genre, timelines and family with the Crains. Why it's better than Castle Rock. Looking forward. 
  
 Support us on www.patreon.com/countthedings
 Find us: www.countthedings.com
 Social: @back2backpod @countthedings


      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

 We try to put our finger on what is missing and decide if we're in or out. 
 The Deuce: Vincent's Vermont Vacation
 Lori's rising star, Candy fighting misogyny in pursuit of her art, breakups, coverups, well done steak, an introducing The Deuce Death Pool. 
 Haunting of Hill House teaser: Navigating genre, timelines and family with the Crains. Why it's better than Castle Rock. Looking forward. 
  
 Support us on www.patreon.com/countthedings
 Find us: www.countthedings.com
 Social: @back2backpod @countthedings

***SPOILER ALERT***
 TV Book Club: Anthony Mayes, Jake Hoye, Amin Elhassan, Eden Liu and Anthony Canton III
 This week: HBO's 'The Deuce'
 Topics: 
 Triple Deuce Episode Breakdown
 Decline of the pimp
 Worst plot lines
 Guerrilla Filming of “Red Hot”
 CC invents POV
 Gene Goldman’s Closet
 Frankie levels up
 Lance Minx doesn’t work like this
 And much more. 
 AC's Spotlight on TV: Reboots and Remakes. Why so many? 
  
 PATREON CONTENT (Patreon.com/countthedings)
  
 Amazon Prime's 'The Romanoffs'
 The Romanoffs
 Questioning the format
 Impact of locations
 Origin of the croissant
 Compelling dynamic between Anushka & Hajar
 Are we in or out on the show?
 End...
  
 For the rest of this episode go to Patreon.com/countthedings

items.content:
Nerder She Wrote: Dave DuFour, David Thorpe and Action Network's Matt Moore with early observations from the first 48 hours of NBA games. 
 Topics:
 Bucks vs Hornets
 How did Giannis look?
 Post-up game
 Eric Bledsoe more engaged
 Other pieces and Mike Budenholzer effect
 Confidence starts with commitment 
 Hornets and keeping Kemba
 Inability to win close games
 Develop youth, trade vets
 Potential trade scenarios 
 Suns look like an NBA team
 Deandre Ayton looks good
 Comfort level is high
 Learning from pros and playing smart
 The Big Man Resurgence. Blip or Trend?
 "Bully Ball" 
 Pistons / Drummond-Blake
 Drummond looks real good
 Pelicans vs Rockets
 Rockets sucked last night. Why?
 Regression
 Nikola Mirotic, and Julius Randle
 Wes Johnson good or nah?
 Final thoughts; Hawks, Heat, Wolves and Kings
 End
 Support us on www.patreon.com/countthedings
 Find us: www.countthedings.com
 Social: @back2backpod @countthedings

items.title: Nerder She Wrote: Very Early Observations

items.content:
Basketball Buds: Zach Harper, Jade, Tom Haberstroh, Jared Dubin, Dave DuFour and Rob Lopez. 
 Topics: 
 The Daily Ding
 FanDuel Challenge 
 LA LIVE Show
 76ers-Celtics
 Celtics built for regular season
 76ers not so good
 Early observations 
 76ers lack of shooting 
 Embiid looked gassed
 76ers tough working the post
 Wilson Chandler missed
 China Hangover
 Kyrie Irving 
 Big guys taking threes 
 Aron Baynes from deep
 JJ Redick vs Fultz
 Simmons' minutes / 6ers depth
 What was Westbrook eating?
 No Russ not good
 Paul George doesn't look right
 Short preseason 
 Jimmy Butler, Glen Taylor and KG
 Butler will not be traded! - Harper
 Butler to Clippers? 76ers? 
 What will reception for Wolves be?
 Thibs the villain 
 Melo the new 6th mn
 Melo Role Play
 Small ball 5
 55 wins?
 Defensive issues
 Bang the over on the Mavs 
 Grizzlies 
 Hornets retro court
 End    Support us on www.patreon.com/countthedings
 Find us: www.countthedings.com
 Social: @back2backpod @countthedings

items.content:
Zach Harper and BIG Wos are joined by former NBA player, writer, international superstar and now podcaster Paul Shirley to talk about his show 'Stories I Tell on Dates' and much more.

 Welcome Paul Shirley

items.title: The Friday Mailbag: Up On The News

items.content:
Zach Harper and Angie Treasure discuss Media Days around the NBA, Jimmy Butler shenanigans in Minnesota, and answer your questions submitted through the #SnarkHoops hashtag. 
 Episode breakdown:
 0:00 -- Cold open about new employment, airplane urination, bossa novas
 8:50 -- Introduction, Media Day madness
 15:15 -- Jimmy Butler stuff happening
 22:00 -- Lakers and LeBron and Jazz stuff
 26:30 -- #SnarkHoops time with housecleaning
 35:30 -- Spoons are bowls
 36:30 -- Which cartoon would you want to exist in?
 41:15 -- Milkshakes as salads when getting ice cream on a date
 44:15 -- Favorite Seth Rogen movie
 47:35 -- Angie featured on other CTD shows
 48:30 -- Arrested with no explanation. What does your family suspect you've done?
 50:30 -- How much better can Donovan Mitchell get?
 51:10 -- House rules you break and keep in your own home
 54:40 -- Who will be the Jazz's All-Star(s)?
 57:35 -- Difference between a bump and a hump, plus Mandy talk
 1:01:25 -- Snark Tank style portrait of the #SnarkHoops duo
 1:02:20 -- Ranking random tidbits from life
 1:05:10 -- Ranking quintessential horror movie plots
 1:11:45 -- How much noise do you need to hear from another bathroom stall before you check on them?
 1:15:20 -- Outros
  
 Support us on www.patreon.com/countthedings
 Find us: www.countthedings.com
 Social: @back2backpod @countthedings


      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

What does your family suspect you've done? 50:30 -- How much better can Donovan Mitchell get? 51:10 -- House rules you break and keep in your own home 54:40 -- Who will be the Jazz's All-Star(s)? 57:35 -- Difference between a bump and a hump, plus Mandy talk 1:01:25 -- Snark Tank style portrait of the #SnarkHoops duo 1:02:20 -- Ranking random tidbits from life 1:05:10 -- Ranking quintessential horror movie plots 1:11:45 -- How much noise do you need to hear from another bathroom stall before you check on them? 1:15:20 -- Outros   Support us on www.patreon.com/countthedings Find us: www.countthedings.com Social: @back2backpod @countthedings
itunes.summary:
Zach Harper and Angie Treasure discuss Media Days around the NBA, Jimmy Butler shenanigans in Minnesota, and answer your questions submitted through the #SnarkHoops hashtag. 
 Episode breakdown:
 0:00 -- Cold open about new employment, airplane urination, bossa novas
 8:50 -- Introduction, Media Day madness
 15:15 -- Jimmy Butler stuff happening
 22:00 -- Lakers and LeBron and Jazz stuff
 26:30 -- #SnarkHoops time with housecleaning
 35:30 -- Spoons are bowls
 36:30 -- Which cartoon would you want to exist in?
 41:15 -- Milkshakes as salads when getting ice cream on a date
 44:15 -- Favorite Seth Rogen movie
 47:35 -- Angie featured on other CTD shows
 48:30 -- Arrested with no explanation. What does your family suspect you've done?
 50:30 -- How much better can Donovan Mitchell get?
 51:10 -- House rules you break and keep in your own home
 54:40 -- Who will be the Jazz's All-Star(s)?
 57:35 -- Difference between a bump and a hump, plus Mandy talk
 1:01:25 -- Snark Tank style portrait of the #SnarkHoops duo
 1:02:20 -- Ranking random tidbits from life
 1:05:10 -- Ranking quintessential horror movie plots
 1:11:45 -- How much noise do you need to hear from another bathroom stall before you check on them?
 1:15:20 -- Outros

***WARNING SPOILERS***
 TV Book Club: Anthony Mayes, Jake Hoye, Anthony Canton III, Eden Liu, Jade and Matt Ruffin
 In this week's episode the crew dissects the latest episode of Better Call Saul, Ep. 8. (45:00) Then the new Netflix series Maniac. 
 (1:07) Also AC's Spotlight on Television and whether too much TV is a good thing. 
 (1:18) And finally what everyone is currently watching.

items.title: Patreon: TV Book Club - Better Call Saul

items.content:
Basketball Buds: Zach Harper, Tom Haberstroh, BIG Wos, Anthony Mayes and The Athletic's Jon Krawczynski
 Topics: 
 Jimmy Butler vs Tom Thibodeau
 The BIG meeting
 Jimmy's Discontent 
 Welcome Ethan
 What does KAT want?
 Bulls-ification of the Wolves
 Team chemistry and not believing in teammates
 Training camp starts next week!
 Thibs as President a problem?
 Scott Layden's role
 KAT's defensive reputation (soft)
 Future scenarios with and without Butler
 Glen Taylor and Thibs 
 Flip Saunders vs Thibs
 Fast tracking Wiggins and Towns
 Thibs brought in too soon?
 How much is Taylor paying attention?
 Andrew Wiggins 
 Ethan & Allie Dog Park Etiquette 
 Daycare
 Making new friends
 Dogs allowed at bars
 Wos, dogs and white people
 Thibs traveling to LA to meet with Butler 
 What does this mean?
 Towns and Wiggins are disappointments 
 Getting fair value for Butler
 Logical destinations
 Teams hiring NBA writers now? 
 Lee Jenkins Private Investigator
 Wade cuts a 10 minute vid 
 Westbrook's knee worrisome?
 Luka Doncic ballin' out
 Who's better? Wiggins vs Booker
 Lutefisk
 Where you going for a Jucy Lucy?
 What happened to small bags of Reese's Pieces?
 End
  
 Support us on www.patreon.com/countthedings
 Find us: www.countthedings.com
 Social: @back2backpod @countthedings

items.title: The Friday Mailbag: Come Back To Earth

items.content:
Patreon on Back To Back: Angie Treasure and Zach Harper are discussing buying plants, inaugural sandwich hall of fame class, and the position you'd want to play in every sport. 
 Episode breakdown:
 0:00 -- Cold open, The Meg, and buying a plant
 9:20 -- Introduction and Angie sick remedies
 14:00 -- Best plants for apartments
 19:00 -- Call for #SnarkHoops submissions and housekeeping
 27:00 -- We found our pod partner tattoo
 30:30 -- Would you amputate paralyzed arms?
 32:15 -- Do penguins or ostriches want to fly more?
 34:00 -- Wet willy as assault and an insane theory by Angie
 39:30 -- Pumpkin spice season: Are we fans?
 41:40 -- Jim from The Office as an action hero?
 43:15 -- Is Diet Coke a dipping sauce?
 45:15 -- Favorite and least favorite home cooking from mom?
 49:45 -- How is it possible to not have seen I Love Lucy or know who the Little Rascals are?
 51:40 -- Famous celebrity crush that you game shamed for?
 55:00 -- Eating right or exercising more difficult?
 57:50 -- Sandwich hall of fame inaugural class
 59:50 -- Protocol for leaving as someone tries to keep a conversation going
 1:01:30 -- Which position would you play in each of the five major sports?
 1:04:00 -- Favorite and least favorite tweets of each other
 1:06:00 -- What's the theme of the bar you would open?
 1:07:30 -- Ranking East Coast grocery chains based on name only
 1:08:40 -- Polarizing musical acts
 1:13:40 -- Ranking breakfast sandwiches -- stack of pancakes as a sandwich
 1:16:00 -- Favorite birthday memories
 1:19:25 -- Five TV series that let people know your taste/personality
 1:22:50 -- Centaur feeding theories and a real weird search about guinea pigs
 End
  
 Support us on www.patreon.com/countthedings
 Find us: www.countthedings.com
 Social: @back2backpod @countthedings

items.title: The Friday Mailbag: Good Things Will Come

items.content:
Nerder She Wrote with Tom Haberstroh
 This week Tom welcomes in Memphis Grizzlies associate head coach Chad Forcier. Chad, a former Spurs assistant, worked closely with Manu Ginobili and he shares that experience on today's show. Plus, an incredible firsthand account of the infamous Malice at the Palace. 
 Topics: 
 Working with Jerry Stackhouse
 Coaching Manu Ginobili
 Thoughts on retirement 
 2013 Finals dealing with devastation 
 Ginobili off the court
 The Euro Step
 2011 Grizzlies-Spurs Game 5
 Spurs without BIG 3 and Kawhi
 Being part of 'Popovich University"
 22 years in the NBA
 Starting with Seattle SuperSonics
 Rick Carlisle connection
 Erik Spoelstra 
 Witness to the Malice in the Palace 
 Calming down Ron Artest
 Lack of security 
 Working with John Hollinger
 Grizzlies outlook
 Kyle Anderson
 Staying healthy on the road
 Manu's sacrifice 
 End
  
 Support us on www.patreon.com/countthedings
 Find us: www.countthedings.com
 Social: @back2backpod @countthedings
  
        


      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

 This week Tom welcomes in Memphis Grizzlies associate head coach Chad Forcier. Chad, a former Spurs assistant, worked closely with Manu Ginobili and he shares that experience on today's show. Plus, an incredible firsthand account of the infamous Malice at the Palace. 
 Topics: 
 Working with Jerry Stackhouse
 Coaching Manu Ginobili
 Thoughts on retirement 
 2013 Finals dealing with devastation 
 Ginobili off the court
 The Euro Step
 2011 Grizzlies-Spurs Game 5
 Spurs without BIG 3 and Kawhi
 Being part of 'Popovich University"
 22 years in the NBA
 Starting with Seattle SuperSonics
 Rick Carlisle connection
 Erik Spoelstra 
 Witness to the Malice in the Palace 
 Calming down Ron Artest
 Lack of security 
 Working with John Hollinger
 Grizzlies outlook
 Kyle Anderson
 Staying healthy on the road
 Manu's sacrifice 
 End
  
 Support us on www.patreon.com/countthedings
 Find us: www.countthedings.com
 Social: @back2backpod @countthedings

items.title: Basketball Buds: Remains In Effect

itunes.author: The Athletic
itunes.subtitle: A complete guide the the NBA
itunes.summary: An NBA podcast featuring a rotating lineup of the best insiders, writers, and reporters from The Athletic. Monday thru Saturday. Monday: Basketball Buds with Zach Harper and Friends | Tuesday: Tampering with Sam Amick, Anthony Slater and Fred Katz | Wednesday: Hoops Adjacent with David Aldridge and Marcus Thompson | Thursday: Point of Contention with Zach Harper, Marcus Thompson and Special Guests | Friday: Nerder She Wrote with Dave DuFour, Seth Partnow, and Mo Dakhil | And the Saturday Slam & Jam with Andrew Schlecht and Alex Speers. Plus, The NBA Daily Ding, a quick recap of the previous night's action.

title: The Athletic NBA Show
